title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.3 - Selection committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.3 - Selection committee

State Regulations
A selection committee for the purpose of choosing the
recipients of the awards shall consist of the Commissioner for Local Government
and five other persons appointed by the Governor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
810.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
